verbose_text: 1 H- 15 N HSQC spectra recorded in the presence of a nicked dsDNA oligonucleotide with the internal 5 ' end phosphorylated (see STAR Methods) instead of PAR also display clear chemical shift changes consistent with the sub-micromolar affinity of the nicked DNA for XRCC1-BRCT1 observed in the fluorescence polarization experiments (see above) and confirming an interaction between XRCC1-BRCT1 and DNA.
